rvl.awt
Class Slider

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          rvl.awt.Slider
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
PiSlider
public class Slider
extends java.awt.Container
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener

GUI Object that implements a slider for display/input of real values. When 0 is included in the scale, there is the option of using a bar connecting the value to 0.

See Also:
Serialized Form
